trans-unit.source: Retrieves the screen coordinates of the rectangular area to which the cursor is confined

target.mrk: Retrieves the screen coordinates of the rectangular area to which the cursor is confined

trans-unit.source: $tagRECT structure that contains the screen coordinates of the confining rectangle.

seg-source.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the screen coordinates of the confining rectangle.

target.mrk: $tagRECT structure that contains the screen coordinates of the confining rectangle.

trans-unit.source: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

target.mrk: Sets the @error flag to non-zero, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information.

trans-unit.source: The calling process must have WINSTA_READATTRIBUTES access to the window station.

target.mrk: The calling process must have WINSTA_READATTRIBUTES access to the window station.
